description: This source file demonstrates how to implement user-level knowledge filtering with PDF URLs in a software project. It shows how to initialize a knowledge base with metadata, load documents into a vector database, and perform filtered queries using an agent. The code includes setup for external dependencies, such as the 'agno' package components, and illustrates different filtering strategies.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of performing knowledge-based queries with optional filters.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base initialized with PDF URLs and associated metadata, supporting filtering.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A wrapper for the LanceDB vector database used to store and retrieve document embeddings.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads documents into the knowledge base, recreating the database if specified.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Executes a query and prints the response, optionally applying filters and markdown formatting.

calls: agent.print_response("Tell me how to make Pad Thai", markdown=True)
